title: InspectionRunEvent
description: Event emitted whenever MCP MultiTool completes an inspection run.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for this event record.

run_id.description: Identifier of the logical inspection run.

tool_name.description: Name of the target tool executed on the downstream MCP server.

state.description: Terminal state reached by the run.

started_at.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the run entered processing.

transport.description: Transport used for the target MCP server.

command.description: Executable invoked for stdio transport (if applicable).

request.description: Serialized request payload sent to the downstream server.

response.description: Structured response body captured from the downstream server.

error.description: Human-readable error message if the run failed.
